directions: Combine 1 1/2 cups milk and pudding mix in a bowl.  Beat with an electric mixer until thick.  Spread pudding into pie crust.

Beat Neufchatel cream cheese, sugar, and 1 tablespoon milk with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping.  Spread over chocolate pudding.  Sprinkle with grated chocolate.  Cover, and chill for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: 2 (1.4 ounce) packages fat-free instant chocolate pudding mix
title: Double Layer Chocolate Pie
